definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: man of Davidic line, post-exil., 1Ch 3:22 LXX Xattouv LXXL Atouv, Ezr 8:2 LXX Touv, A LXXL Attouv.
a builder at the wall of Jerus. Ne 3:10, LXX Atouq, LXXL Attouv.
head of priestly house, post-exil., Ne 10:5 LXX Touv, LXXL Attouv. Ne 12:2 LXXL Attouv (B om.); relation to
